name: TI_2_1_3_6_Back_Up_Recovery_Completed_System_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.3.6 Back Up Recovery Completed System Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track back-up recovery completed event.
purpose: Capture back-up recovery completed event, both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.6#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when database recovery is completed.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.6#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.6#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.6#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.6#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.6#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.6#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.6#08
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture backup recovery success or failure.
